assignments.description: Using the vInput_BidPhase variable set the selected Bid Phase and the Due Date.
assignments.name: Set_Selected_Vars_Input
assignments.label: Set Selected Vars

assignments.name: Show_Bid_MGMT_Parent_Warning_on_Screen
assignments.label: Show Bid MGMT Parent Warning on Screen

decisions.description: If an existing Bid Management BSR was found for the phase then continue. Otherwise automatically create a Bid Management BSR and parent the newly created BSR to it.
decisions.name: Bid_Management_BSR_Found
decisions.label: Bid Management BSR Found?

decisions.description: Is the Bid Team set on the Opp? If not then ask user to select Bid Team. Once Bid Team's set attempt to set the Head of Bid automatically. If this not possible then get user to select HoB.
decisions.name: Bid_Team_Set
decisions.label: Bid Team Set?

decisions.description: If Files were added by the user then loop through these and link them to the newly created Bid Support Request.
decisions.name: Files_Attached_Decision
decisions.label: Files Attached?

decisions.description: Based on the Bid Team selection was a Head of Bid found?
decisions.name: Head_of_Bid_Found_from_Team_Decision
decisions.label: Head of Bid Found?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: No - User Set Head of Bid

decisions.description:
Is the Head of Bid set on Opp?
If not then ensure user selects the Head of Bid before proceeding.
decisions.name: Head_of_Bid_Set
decisions.label: Head of Bid Set?

decisions.description: If the vInput_BidPhase variable was populated then skip straight to record type selection.
decisions.name: Input_Phase_Provided
decisions.label: Input Phase Provided?

decisions.description: Does the Parent BSR Check need to run? Where nothing selected (because user didn't visit the screen) then skip the check. Also if the Bid Management Parent warning was already shown or the current record is a Bid Management record type then skip.
decisions.name: Parent_BSR_Check_Required
decisions.label: Parent BSR Check Required?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Other - Check Bid Management BSR Exists

decisions.description: If the Record Type was already set then skip assigning the record type from the user selected value.
decisions.name: Record_Type_Already_Set_Decision
decisions.label: Record Type Already Set?

Flow.description: Sub Flow called by Opportunity: Create Bid Support Screen Flow and Bid: Create Bid Support Screen Flow to create Bid Support records.
Flow.interviewLabel: Bid Support: Create Bid Support Sub Flow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Bid Support: Create Bid Support Sub Flow

recordLookups.description: Check if the selected Phase already has a Bid Management BSR Record that isn't closed.
recordLookups.name: Check_Bid_Management_BSR
recordLookups.label: Check Bid Management BSR

recordLookups.name: Get_Bid_Mgmt_Record_Type_ID
recordLookups.label: Get Bid Mgmt Record Type ID

fields.name: BidTeam_DT
fields.fieldText: Before requesting Bid Support the applicable Bid Team must be selected. This ensures the request is routed to the right place.

fields.name: Parent_BSR_Warning_Message
fields.fieldText:
WARNING: {!Record_Type} Bid Supports need to be parented to an Open Bid Management record. An eligible parent record does not currently exist for the {!PlanPhases_Table.firstSelectedRow.Type__c} Bid Phase and so one will be automatically created for you.


Click Continue to create both of these records.

fields.name: ErrorScreeen
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while attempting to create the Bid Support Request.


Please review the Error Message below. If it relates to something you are able to resolve yourself (such as a misaligned date) then please do so and try again.


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}


If you are unable to resolve the error yourself then please raise a request via ServiceNow (Report a Problem, Business Applications, Salesforce, Bid Management). Make sure to include as much information as possible.

fields.name: Head_of_Bid_Required_Text
fields.fieldText:
Before you can create a Bid Support request the Head of Bid must be set on the Opportunity.


Please choose the Head of Bid.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Phase_Selection_Message
fields.fieldText:
Bid Support Requests must be linked to an eligible Phase from the Opportunity Timeline.


For a Phase to be eligible it must not yet have reached its End Date.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_No_Phases_Available_Message
fields.fieldText: No Eligible Phases were found. Please update the End Date of the existing Phases or create new Phases from the Timeline tab and then try again.

fields.name: Phase_Selection_Message
fields.fieldText:
In order to create a Bid Support Request you must select the Procurement Phase that it relates to (eg; RFI).

For a Phase to be eligible it must not yet have reached its End Date. If you do not see the Phase that you need Support for then please ensure its End Date has not yet passed.

value.stringValue: Bid Support: Create Bid Support Sub Flow

variables.description: Count the existing eligible Bid Phases to be used on the Bid Phase Selection screen to show a message that the user needs to setup/update the eligible Bid Phases before they can raise a request for Bid Support.
variables.name: v_Count_BidPhases
